chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d <-> (forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d)

Premises:
preDTA = Map state : Set
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop
state = Map prec_list : Set
preDTA_ref_ok = fun d : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state) (c : ad) (pl : prec_list) (b : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s -> MapGet prec_list s c = Some pl -> prec_occur pl b -> exists s0 : state, MapGet state d b = Some s0 : preDTA -> Prop
ad = N : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A For Some: Arguments are renamed to A, a For Some: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For None: Argument A is implicit and maximally inserted For option: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Some: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For None: Argument scope is [type_scope]
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
preDTA_ref_ok_distinct = fun d d' : preDTA => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_ref_ok s d' : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
state_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) (a : ad) => exists b : ad, MapGet state d b = Some s /\ a <> b : preDTA -> state -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (a c : ad), MapGet state d a = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_diff_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) (a : ad) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 /\ a <> b : preDTA -> prec_list -> ad -> Prop
prec_in_dta_cont = fun (d : preDTA) (p : prec_list) => exists (s : state) (b c : ad) (p0 : prec_list), MapGet state d b = Some s /\ MapGet prec_list s c = Some p0 /\ prec_contained p p0 : preDTA -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_list_ref_ok = fun (p : prec_list) (d : preDTA) => forall a : ad, prec_occur p a -> exists s : state, MapGet state d a = Some s : prec_list -> preDTA -> Prop
state_ref_ok_M2_destr : forall (s0 s1 : state) (d : preDTA), state_ref_ok (M2 prec_list s0 s1) d -> state_ref_ok s0 d /\ state_ref_ok s1 d
prec_list_ref_ok_destr : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (d : preDTA), prec_list_ref_ok (prec_cons a la ls) d -> prec_list_ref_ok la d /\ prec_list_ref_ok ls d
DTA_ref_ok = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p _ => preDTA_ref_ok p end : DTA -> Prop
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal = fun s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t => forall a : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s < -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.In a s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t -> Prop
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose_3 : forall (s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t) (x y : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.elt), FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = Some x -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s' = Some y -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s' -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.E.eq x y
sumbool_rec : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_rect : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Type), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumbool_ind : forall (A B : Prop) (P : {A} + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (left a)) -> (forall b : B, P (right b)) -> forall s : {A} + {B}, P s
sumor_ind : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Prop), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
sumor_rec : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Set), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
sumor_rect : forall (A : Type) (B : Prop) (P : A + {B} -> Type), (forall a : A, P (inleft a)) -> (forall b : B, P (inright b)) -> forall s : A + {B}, P s
sigT_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (P0 : {x : A & P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (existT P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A & P x}, P0 s
sig_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Prop), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sig_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
sigT_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (P0 : {x : A & P x} -> Type), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (existT P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A & P x}, P0 s
sig_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (P0 : {x : A | P x} -> Set), (forall (x : A) (p : P x), P0 (exist P x p)) -> forall s : {x : A | P x}, P0 s
taille_1 = fix taille_1 (s : state) : nat := match s with | @M0 _ => 0 | @M1 _ _ y => taille_0 y | @M2 _ x y => PeanoNat.Nat.max (taille_1 x) (taille_1 y) end : state -> nat
FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose_3' : forall s s' : FSetPositive.PositiveSet.t, FSetPositive.PositiveSet.Equal s s' -> FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s = FSetPositive.PositiveSet.choose s'
MapSweep_semantics_2_2 : forall (A : Type) (f : ad -> A -> bool) (m : Map A) (pf fp : ad -> ad), (forall a0 : ad, fp (pf a0) = a0) -> forall (a : ad) (y : A), MapSweep1 A f pf m = Some (a, y) -> MapGet A m (fp a) = Some y

```coq
intros d.
split.
- intros H a s H0.
  destruct (H a s H0) as [s0 H1].
  exists s0.
  exact H1.
- intros H a s H0 c pl H1 H2.
  apply H in H0.
  destruct H0 as [s0 H3].
  exists s0.
  split; auto.
Qed.

original: intros d. split. - intros H a s H0. destruct (H a s H0) as [s0 H1]. exists s0. apply H1. - intros H a s H0 c pl H1 H2. apply H in H0. destruct H0 as [s0 H3]. exists s0. split; auto.
